postsData.title: Slice...
postsData.body: This concept is quite interesting with Redux Toolkit!!

postsData.title: Creating Reducers
postsData.body: So, imagine you have a reducer... and it's like the superhero of your app!

postsData.title: Async Actions
postsData.body: Alright, folks! Let's talk about async actions in Redux Toolkit. Buckle up!

postsData.title: Immutable State
postsData.body: Immutable state is like a rock-solid fortress protecting your app's data!

postsData.title: Selectors
postsData.body: Selectors are like magical spells that conjure the exact data you need!

postsData.title: Middleware
postsData.body: Middleware is like the cool kid in town, adding extra powers to your Redux app!
